   19: %%
   20: -module(user_skip_13_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -compile(export_all).
   23: -define(TOP1_KEY, top1_key).
   24: 
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   26: 
   27: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   28: %% Function: suite() -> Info
   29: %% Info = [tuple()]
   30: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   31: suite() ->
   32:     [{timetrap,{seconds,30}}].
   33: 
   34: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   35: %% Function: init_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
   36: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   37: %% GroupName = atom()
   38: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   39: %% Reason = term()
   40: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   41: init_per_group(top1, Config) ->
   42:     [{?TOP1_KEY, top1_specific} | Config];
   43: init_per_group(sub12, Config) ->
   44:     {skip,"Sub group skipped"};
   45: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   46:     Config.
   47: 
   48: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   49: %% Function: end_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
   50: %%               void() | {save_config,Config1}
   51: %% GroupName = atom()
   52: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   53: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   54: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
   55:     ok.
   56: 
   57: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   58: %% Function: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
   59: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   60: %% TestCase = atom()
   61: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   62: %% Reason = term()
   63: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   64: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   65:     Config.
   66: 
   67: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   68: %% Function: end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
   69: %%               void() | {save_config,Config1}
   70: %% TestCase = atom()
   71: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   72: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   73: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
   74:     ok.
   75: 
   76: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   77: %% Function: groups() -> [Group]
   78: %% Group = {GroupName,Properties,GroupsAndTestCases}
   79: %% GroupName = atom()
   80: %% Properties = [parallel | sequence | Shuffle | {RepeatType,N}]
   81: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [Group | {group,GroupName} | TestCase]
   82: %% TestCase = atom()
   83: %% Shuffle = shuffle | {shuffle,{integer(),integer(),integer()}}
   84: %% RepeatType = repeat | repeat_until_all_ok | repeat_until_all_fail |
   85: %%              repeat_until_any_ok | repeat_until_any_fail
   86: %% N = integer() | forever
   87: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   88: groups() ->
   89:     [{top1,[],[{sub11, [], [tc1]}, {sub12, [], [tc1]}]},
   90:      {top2,[],[{sub21, [], [tc2]}, {sub22, [], [tc2]}]}].
   91: 
   92: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   93: %% Function: all() -> GroupsAndTestCases | {skip,Reason}
   94: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [{group,GroupName} | TestCase]
   95: %% GroupName = atom()
   96: %% TestCase = atom()
   97: %% Reason = term()
   98: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   99: all() ->
  100:     [{group,top1}, {group,top2}].
  101: 
  102: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  103: %% Function: TestCase(Config0) ->
  104: %%               ok | exit() | {skip,Reason} | {comment,Comment} |
  105: %%               {save_config,Config1} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
  106: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
  107: %% Reason = term()
  108: %% Comment = term()
  109: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  110: tc1(_) ->
  111:     ok.
  112: 
  113: tc2(Config) ->
  114:     undefined = ?config(?TOP1_KEY, Config).
